unknown_usage: <red>Number of arguments does not match the correct amount or unknown arguments! Type <dark_red>/bw help <red>for help!
no_permissions: <red>You don't have the permission to do that!
safe_reload: <green>I'm waiting for safe stop of all games or for 60 seconds before reload!
safe_reload_failed_to_stop_game: <red>Some games have not ended within the time limit, so their arena may have been damaged!

admin.cannot_create: <red>Sign couldn't be created! Please check the name of the arena!
admin.cannot_destroy: <red>You don't have permissions to destroy this sign!
admin.unknown_game: <red>The game that is written on the sign doesnt exist! Please contact an admin!

statistics.disabled: <red>Player statistics are disabled on this server!
statistics.not_found: <red>Statistics for this player are not found!

errors.game_already_running: <red>Game <gray><arena> <red>is already running! You can't join a running game!
errors.game_is_full: <red>Game <gray><arena> <red>is full! Please wait for game end!
errors.not_in_any_game_yet: <red>You haven't been in any game yet.
errors.command_is_not_allowed: <red>This command is blocked while the game is running!
errors.vip_game_is_full: <red>Game <gray><arena> <red>is full of VIP players. Please wait for game end!
errors.game_is_gone: <red>Looks like the game you were in is no longer in this world.
errors.there_is_no_empty_game: <red>There's no game in waiting state. All games are already running!

destroyed.subtitle: You can now kill the team members!
destroyed.subtitle_victim: Now you will never be respawned!

spawner.not_enough_level: <red>Spawner can't work! You need to upgrade by <levels> levels.

help.title: Screaming BedWars <version> - Help
help.bw_leaderboard: /bw leaderboard - <green>Show top players of this server
help.bw_addholo: /bw addholo [leaderboard|stats]- <yellow>Adds hologram to the player's location
help.bw_removeholo: /bw removeholo - <yellow>After executing this command, the player can right-click the holographic statistic to remove it.
help.bw_mainlobby: /bw mainlobby [enable|set] - <yellow>Enables main lobby or sets main lobby location
help.bw_admin_info:
/bw admin
info [section] - Shows you all information about arena
help.bw_admin_lobby:
/bw admin
lobby - Sets lobby position to your position
help.bw_admin_spec:
/bw admin
spec - Sets specatator's spawn to your position
help.bw_admin_pos1:
/bw admin
pos1 - Sets the extreme point of the arena to your position
help.bw_admin_pos2:
/bw admin
pos2 - Sets the second extreme point of the arena to your position
help.bw_admin_pausecountdown:
/bw admin
pausecountdown
- Sets the pause duration before game starts
help.bw_admin_minplayers:
/bw admin
minplayers
- Sets minimum of players needed to start the game
help.bw_admin_team_add:
/bw admin
team add
- Add a team to the game
help.bw_admin_team_maxplayers:
/bw admin
team maxplayers
- Change max team players
help.bw_admin_team_spawn:
/bw admin
team spawn
- Sets team spawn to your position
help.bw_admin_team_bed:
/bw admin
team bed
- Sets team target block to your target position (it can be another block, not just bed)
help.bw_admin_jointeam:
/bw admin
jointeam
- Sets the ability to connect to a team using an entity
help.bw_admin_spawner_add:
/bw admin
spawner add 
 [hologram] [first level] [name] [team] [max spawned resources]
- Add item spawner to your position
help.bw_admin_store_add:
/bw admin
store add [name above dealer head] [file with shop] [use main shop] - Add trading villager to your position
help.bw_admin_store_remove:
/bw admin
store remove - Remove trading villager from your position
help.bw_admin_store_type:
/bw admin
store type
- Sets entity type of store (Villager, Horse, Cow, Pig etc.)
help.bw_admin_config:
/bw admin
config
- Sets value of constant variable for game
help.bw_admin_arena_time:
/bw admin
arenatime
- Sets time in arena (DAY, NIGHT, etc.)
help.bw_admin_arena_weather:
/bw admin
arenaweather
- Sets weather in arena (default, CLEAN, DOWNFALL)
help.bw_admin_post_game_waiting:
/bw admin
postgamewaiting
- Sets the waiting time before player is teleported out of the arena
help.bw_admin_customprefix:
/bw admin
customprefix
- Enables custom prefix for arena
help.bw_admin_edit:
/bw admin
edit - Turns the game off and switches the arena to edit mode
help.bw_admin_save:
/bw admin
save - Saves the game and activates it!
help.bw_alljoin: /bw alljoin [arena] - <green>Joins all players on the server to bedwars game
help.bw_admin_spawner_remove:
/bw admin
spawner remove - Removes all spawners at location
help.bw_admin_store_child:
/bw admin
store child - Mark this shopkeeper as child
help.bw_admin_store_adult:
/bw admin
store adult - Mark this shopkeeper as adult
help.bw_dump: /bw dump - <yellow>Dumps the server and gives you link to the dump. This link can be useful for support
help.bw_admin_interactive:
/bw admin
interactive - If arena is in edit mode, this command will enable interactive mode

new_release: <green>New RELEASE version <version> of BedWars is available!
patch_release: <yellow>New patch release for BedWars <version> is here!

error.arena_not_in_edit:
Arena doesn't exist or is running! Deactivate it with /bw admin
edit and then activate it with /bw admin
save

errors.must_be_in_same_world: <red>All commands must be executed in the same world!
errors.must_be_in_bounds: <red>Location must be placed inside the arena (pos1 and pos2 coordinates)!
errors.set_bounds_first: <red>Before setting spawn, please set the pos1 and pos2 coordinates (Determining the size and position of the arena)!
errors.invalid_bounds: <red>The height difference between pos1 and pos2 is too small! The minimum is 5 blocks!
errors.invalid_spawner_type: <red>Spawner must be bronze, iron, gold, or by custom configuration!
errors.invalid_spawner_level: <white>Wrong level number, default level 1 was used.
errors.spawners_needed: <red>The game must have at least one item spawner!
errors.set_bounds_before_save: <red>Before saving the game please set the pos1 and pos2 coordinates (Determining the size and position of the arena)!
errors.set_lobby_before_save: <red>Before saving the game please set lobby spawn!
errors.set_spec_before_save: <red>Before saving the game please set spec spawn!
errors.set_stores_before_save: <red>Before saving the game please add at least 1 store!
errors.set_spawners_before_save: <red>Before saving the game please add at least 1 spawner!
errors.set_target_block_for_team_before_save: <red>Before saving the game please set target block of team <gray><team><red>!
errors.set_spawn_for_team_before_save: <red>Before saving the game please set spawn of team <gray><team><red>!
errors.npc_must_have_skin_name: <red>If you use entity type PLAYER, you must specify skin name in format <gray>PLAYER:[skin's owner]

success.saved_and_started: <green>The game has been successfully saved and is running! Now you can join and play in the arena!
success.target_block_set: <green>Target block (<gray><material><green>) of team <gray><team><green> was successfully set to position XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z>
success.team_spawn_set: <green>Spawn of team gray><team><green> was successfully set to position XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z> <green>YAW: <gray><yaw> <green>PITCH: <gray><pitch>
success.team_maxplayers_set: <green>Maximal count of players in team <gray><team><green> was successfully set to <gray><maxplayers>
success.team_created: <green>Team <gray><team><green> was successfully created with color <teamcolor><green> and maximal player count: <gray><maxplayers>
success.spawner_added: <green>Spawner <gray><resource><green> was successfully added to position XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z>
success.store_added: <green>A store was added to your position: <gray><x>/<y>/<z> <green>YAW: <gray><yaw> <green>PITCH: <gray><pitch>
success.store_removed: <green>Villager from position XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z><green> was successfully removed!
success.lobby_spawn_set: <green>Lobby spawn was successfully set to position XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z> <green>YAW: <gray><yaw> <green>PITCH: <gray><pitch>
success.spec_spawn_set: <green>Spectator spawn was successfully set to position XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z> <green>YAW: <gray><yaw> <green>PITCH: <gray><pitch>
success.pos1_set: <green>Position 1 of arena <gray><arena><green> was set to XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z>
success.pos2_set: <green>Position 2 of arena <gray><arena><green> was set to XYZ: <gray><x>/<y>/<z>
success.arena_time_set: <green>Arena's world time has been set to <gray><time><green>!
success.weather_set: <green>Arena's world weather has been set to <gray><weather><green>!
success.store_entity_type_set: <green>Store's living entity type has been set to <gray><type><green>!
success.child_state: <green>Variable isBaby for this shopkeeper has been changed to <gray><value>
success.post_game_waiting: <green>Waiting time after game has been successfully set to <gray><number><green>!

mainlobby.info: <red>WARNING<white>: You need to execute /bw reload to make Mainlobby work!

holo.not_enabled: <red>Holographic is disabled. Do you have Holographic Displays installed?
holo.click_to_remove: <yellow>Now click the holographic you want to remove!

team_join_entity.click_right_on_entity: <green>Now use right click on the desired entity for which you want to set up join to team: <gray><team>
team_join_entity.entity_not_compatible: <red>The Entity you are trying to use is not compatible! Only Living entities or Armor Stands can be used!

trap.caught: <red>You got caught in trap of team <white><team><red>!
trap.caught_team: <white><player><red> got caught in your team's trap!
trap.built: <green>You've built a trap! Now wait for someone to get caught in it!

warp_powder.started: <green>WarpPowder was started! Please don't move for <gray><time><green> seconds!

rescue_platform.not_in_air: <red>For using this, you need to be in the air.
rescue_platform.created: <green>Platform is created and will be destroyed in <white><time> <green>seconds.

protection_wall.not_usable_here: <red>There is no space left for creating Protection Wall.
protection_wall.created: <green>Protection Wall is created and will be destroyed in <white><time> <green>seconds.

arrow_blocker.started: <green>Arrow blocker has been activated for <white><time><green> seconds!

specials.item_delay: <red>You need to wait <time> seconds before using this item again!

leaderboard.holo_added: <green>Leaderboard hologram was added to your position!

command.invalid_arguments: <red>Invalid number of arguments!, type /bw party help to know more
command.help: /bw party warp - <yellow>Warps all players to your game or towards you
command.not_in_party: <red>You have to be in a party to do this command!
command.not_party_leader: <red>You are not the leader of this party!
command.is_empty: <red>Your party is empty, cannot warp anyone!

language.usage_bw_lang:
Usage: /bw lang
- Sets the locale to be used by BedWars
language.invalid: <red>The specified language file could not be loaded!
language.already_set: Language: [<lang>] is already set as the default language!
